channel.title: 667 Matrix Based Portal Dialouge Error!
channel.description:
Hi!
So iv been adding a load of dialouge recently and I added a new minigame called TheGraadorMinigame. Going to rename it Graador Madness. Anyway, I spawned the portal, created the dialouge all ok. Added things in DialougeHandler and Object Handler. But when I complie i get this 1 error.
starting... src\com\rs\game\player\dialouges\TheGraadorMinigame.java:5: error: class TheGraadorMinigame is public, should be declared in a file named TheGraadorMinigame.java public class TheGraadorMiniGame extends Dialouge {
Now I have looked around and the name is the same in everything (ObjectHandler.java, TheGraadorMinigame.java, DialougeHandler.java) but still no luck.
Could really do with some help here iv hit a wall :/
Cheers,
Jack

item.title: 667 Matrix Based Portal Dialouge Error!
item.dc:creator: @jackabe jackabe
item.description:
@jackabe wrote:

Hi!

So iv been adding a load of dialouge recently and I added a new minigame called TheGraadorMinigame. Going to rename it Graador Madness. Anyway, I spawned the portal, created the dialouge all ok. Added things in DialougeHandler and Object Handler. But when I complie i get this 1 error.

startingâ€¦
src\com\rs\game\player\dialouges\TheGraadorMinigame.java:5: error: class TheGraadorMinigame is public, should be declared in a file named TheGraadorMinigame.java
public class TheGraadorMiniGame extends Dialouge {

Now I have looked around and the name is the same in everything (ObjectHandler.java, TheGraadorMinigame.java, DialougeHandler.java) but still no luck.

Could really do with some help here iv hit a wall

Cheers,

Jack
